markdown:
Rohde & Schwarz Visit
=====================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Mar 7, 2018 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423428.jpg)

ATT research group had an interesting industrial visit from the delegation of Rohde & Schwarz, Singapore. During the visit, the delegation was briefed about current and future direction of research in our group. We has also prepared demonstration of our research products.

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423441.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423442.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423443.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423444.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423445.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423446.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423447.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423448.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423449.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423450.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423455.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423426.jpg) ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/photo6125315047560423427.jpg)
